message.content:
cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with recognizing activities in short videos, which involves computer vision techniques such as visual and spatio-temporal localization. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also uses auditory features, which could fall under cs.MM (Multimedia). Additionally, the paper uses textual features and fusion techniques, which could fall under cs.CL (Computation and Language) and cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Finally, the paper uses state-of-the-art techniques, which could fall under cs.LG (Machine Learning).
